nodes.text: I've heard that the Drat Invasion is caused by a Drat Queen - and to get to her, I need to go to the "Creepy Guy's" lair through a painting in the library.
How did you find this out?
I have a furry informant who knows the secret ways of the castle very well.
I don't think the Librarian will approve of you moving the paintings around...
Well, it is for a good cause...
I'm so glad that you suvived your ordeal from the other night. How are you feeling, Shawn?
(shrug) I'm fine... just a bit sore. I just wanted to thank you for saving my life.
It was fortunate that I was exploring that section of the Catacombs when I found you - and that I always carry a healing potion with me. Please be more careful next time.
Hey, Thomas, I found this book in Darla's Wing with your name on it.
I've been looking for this library book all over! We aren't supposed to take books from here, but I got special permission from Master von Urwald to borrow it.
Thank you so much, Shawn! I really didn't want to tell the Librarian that I had misplaced this.
Thomas looks so cute when she's studying. I guess I won't disturb her concentration.
Thomas looks so involved in his reading that I guess I won't disturb him right now. Maybe later...
